quiz.question: condone __________
quiz.explanation: 宽恕，宽恕腐败。The committee refused to condone corruption. 委员会拒绝宽恕腐败。

quiz.question: ________ cyclone
quiz.explanation: 飓风，热带飓风。A tropical cyclone approached the coast. 热带飓风接近海岸。

quiz.question: _____ throne
quiz.explanation: 王座，皇家王座。The king sat on the royal throne. 国王坐在皇家王座上。

quiz.question: atone ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 赎罪，为罪孽赎罪。He sought to atone for sins. 他试图为罪孽赎罪。

quiz.question: _______ monotone
quiz.explanation: 单调，单调的低沉声音。His droning monotone put people to sleep. 他单调的低沉声音让人昏昏欲睡。

quiz.question: ______ milestone
quiz.explanation: 里程碑，职业里程碑。Getting promoted was a career milestone. 获得晋升是职业里程碑。

quiz.question: limestone ____
quiz.explanation: 石灰石，石灰石洞穴。The limestone cave had stalactites. 石灰石洞穴有钟乳石。

quiz.question: rhinestone ________
quiz.explanation: 人造钻石，人造钻石项链。She wore a rhinestone necklace. 她戴着人造钻石项链。

quiz.question: ____ touchstone
quiz.explanation: 试金石，酸试金石。The acid touchstone tested gold purity. 酸试金石测试黄金纯度。

quiz.question: airborne _________
quiz.explanation: 空气传播的，空气传播的颗粒。Airborne particles can cause allergies. 空气传播的颗粒会引起过敏。

quiz.question: ____ dune
quiz.explanation: 沙丘，沙丘。They climbed a tall sand dune. 他们爬上了高沙丘。

quiz.question: jejune _____
quiz.explanation: 幼稚的，幼稚的想法。His jejune ideas lacked depth. 他幼稚的想法缺乏深度。

quiz.question: _____ commune
quiz.explanation: 公社，农村公社。They lived in a rural commune. 他们住在农村公社。

quiz.question: importune __________
quiz.explanation: 强求，反复强求。Don't importune repeatedly for favors. 不要反复强求恩惠。

quiz.question: opportune ______
quiz.explanation: 适时的，适时的时刻。It was an opportune moment to ask. 这是适时的时刻去询问。

quiz.question: attune __ _____
quiz.explanation: 使协调，使协调需求。The policy should attune to needs. 政策应使协调需求。

quiz.question: anodyne ______
quiz.explanation: 无害的，无害的评论。He made an anodyne remark. 他发表了无害的评论。

quiz.question: ______ hoe
quiz.explanation: 锄头，花园锄头。Use the garden hoe to weed. 使用花园锄头除草。

quiz.question: ______ roe
quiz.explanation: 鱼子，鲑鱼鱼子。Salmon roe is a delicacy. 鲑鱼鱼子是美味佳肴。

quiz.question: Cape ____
quiz.explanation: 海角，合恩角。Ships rounded Cape Horn. 船只绕过合恩角。

quiz.question: _____ agape
quiz.explanation: 张大嘴，张大嘴。He stood with mouth agape. 他张大嘴站着。

quiz.question: shipshape _____
quiz.explanation: 井井有条的，井井有条的船舱。The shipshape cabin was tidy. 井井有条的船舱很整洁。

quiz.question: _____ jape
quiz.explanation: 戏弄，残忍的戏弄。The cruel jape hurt his feelings. 残忍的戏弄伤害了他的感情。

quiz.question: scrape __
quiz.explanation: 勉强度日，勉强度日。They barely scrape by on minimum wage. 他们靠最低工资勉强度日。

quiz.question: ________ gripe
quiz.explanation: 抱怨，不断的抱怨。His constant gripe annoyed everyone. 他不断的抱怨惹恼了每个人。

quiz.question: _____ kaleidoscope
quiz.explanation: 万花筒，色彩万花筒。The color kaleidoscope created beautiful patterns. 色彩万花筒创造了美丽的图案。

quiz.question: ___ stethoscope
quiz.explanation: 听诊器，使用听诊器。Doctors use stethoscope to check heartbeat. 医生使用听诊器检查心跳。

quiz.question: ________ microscope
quiz.explanation: 显微镜，电子显微镜。Scientists used an electron microscope. 科学家使用了电子显微镜。

quiz.question: lope _____
quiz.prediction: 大步慢跑，大步慢跑。The horse would lope along the trail. 马会沿着小径大步慢跑。

quiz.question: interlope __ _____
quiz.explanation: 干涉，干涉贸易。Don't interlope in trade negotiations. 不要干涉贸易谈判。

quiz.question: ______ misanthrope
quiz.explanation: 厌世者，愤世嫉俗的厌世者。He became a bitter misanthrope. 他成了愤世嫉俗的厌世者。

quiz.question: ______ heliotrope
quiz.explanation: 天芥菜，紫色天芥菜。Purple heliotrope flowers bloomed. 紫色天芥菜花开了。

quiz.question: _____ isotope
quiz.explanation: 同位素，放射性同位素。Radio isotope are used in medicine. 放射性同位素用于医学。

quiz.question: dupe _________
quiz.explanation: 欺骗，欺骗消费者。False ads dupe consumers. 虚假广告欺骗消费者。

quiz.question: ______ archetype
quiz.explanation: 原型，神话原型。The hero is a mythic archetype. 英雄是神话原型。

quiz.question: daguerreotype ________
quiz.explanation: 银版照相，银版照相肖像。The daguerreotype portrait was from 1850. 银版照相肖像来自1850年。

quiz.question: prototype _____
quiz.explanation: 原型，原型模型。They built a prototype model first. 他们首先制作了原型模型。

quiz.question: bare _____
quiz.explanation: 赤裸的，赤裸的事实。Just give me the bare facts. 只给我赤裸的事实。

quiz.question: scare ______
quiz.explanation: 恐吓，恐吓策略。They used scare tactic to manipulate. 他们使用恐吓策略操纵。

quiz.question: _____ fanfare
quiz.explanation: 号角声，铜管号角声。Brass fanfare announced the arrival. 铜管号角声宣告到来。

quiz.question: mare's ____
quiz.explanation: 母马，母马窝（虚幻之事）。The story was a mare's nest. 这个故事是虚幻之事。

quiz.question: tare ______
quiz.explanation: 皮重，皮重重量。Subtract the tare weight from total. 从总重量中减去皮重重量。

quiz.question: square ____
quiz.explanation: 公平的，公平的交易。He gave them a square deal. 他给了他们公平的交易。

quiz.question: macabre ____
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的故事。He told a macabre tale. 他讲了一个可怕的故事。

quiz.question: _____ calibre
quiz.explanation: 口径，步枪口径。Check the rifle calibre. 检查步枪口径。

quiz.question: ____ timbre
quiz.explanation: 音色，丰富的音色。Her voice had a rich timbre. 她的声音有丰富的音色。

quiz.question: massacre _______
quiz.explanation: 屠杀，屠杀受害者。The massacre victims were remembered. 屠杀受害者被铭记。

quiz.question: ______ lucre
quiz.explanation: 金钱，不义之财。He was motivated by filthy lucre. 他被不义之财驱使。

quiz.question: adhere __ _____
quiz.explanation: 遵守，遵守规则。Everyone must adhere to rules. 每个人都必须遵守规则。

quiz.question: ________ hemisphere
quiz.explanation: 半球，北半球。Canada is in the Northern hemisphere. 加拿大位于北半球。

quiz.question: ______ biosphere
quiz.explanation: 生物圈，全球生物圈。The global biosphere is interconnected. 全球生物圈相互联系。

quiz.question: _____ premiere
quiz.explanation: 首映，世界首映。The film had its world premiere. 这部电影举行了世界首映。

quiz.question: sere ______
quiz.explanation: 枯萎的，枯萎的叶子。Sere leaves covered the ground. 枯萎的叶子覆盖着地面。

quiz.question: revere ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 尊敬，尊敬古人。They revere the ancients. 他们尊敬古人。

quiz.question: ire __ ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 愤怒，人群的愤怒。The decision aroused the ire of the crowd. 这个决定引起了人群的愤怒。

quiz.question: doctrinaire ______
quiz.explanation: 教条的，教条的立场。He took a doctrinaire stance. 他采取了教条的立场。

quiz.question: dire ____________
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的后果。The decision had dire consequences. 这个决定有可怕的后果。

quiz.question: _____ __ mire
quiz.explanation: 泥潭，陷入泥潭。The car was stuck in mire. 汽车陷入泥潭。

quiz.question: ____ repertoire
quiz.explanation: 保留剧目，歌曲保留剧目。The singer had a varied song repertoire. 歌手有多样化的歌曲保留剧目。

quiz.question: vampire ___
quiz.explanation: 吸血鬼，吸血鬼蝙蝠。The vampire bat fed at night. 吸血鬼蝙蝠在夜间觅食。

quiz.question: _______ umpire
quiz.explanation: 裁判，板球裁判。The cricket umpire made the call. 板球裁判做出了判决。

quiz.question: ______ spire
quiz.explanation: 尖顶，教堂尖顶。The church spire reached high. 教堂尖顶高耸入云。

quiz.question: aspire __ _________
quiz.explanation: 渴望，渴望伟大。Young athletes aspire to greatness. 年轻运动员渴望伟大。

quiz.question: conspire ________
quiz.explanation: 密谋，共同密谋。The plotters would conspire together. 阴谋者会共同密谋。

quiz.question: ________ expire
quiz.explanation: 到期，护照到期。Your passport expire next month. 你的护照下个月到期。

quiz.question: ______ satire
quiz.explanation: 讽刺，尖刻的讽刺。He wrote biting satire. 他写了尖刻的讽刺。

quiz.question: ______ attire
quiz.explanation: 服装，正式服装。Guests wore formal attire. 客人穿着正式服装。

quiz.question: ____ ore
quiz.explanation: 矿石，铁矿石。They mined iron ore. 他们开采铁矿石。

quiz.question: bore __ _____
quiz.explanation: 使厌烦，使厌烦至死。The lecture would bore to death. 讲座会使厌烦至死。

quiz.question: _ score __
quiz.explanation: 二十，一群（二十个）。A score of years passed. 二十年过去了。

quiz.question: adore _ ____
quiz.explanation: 崇拜，崇拜英雄。Children adore a hero. 孩子们崇拜英雄。

quiz.question: _____ chore
quiz.explanation: 家务，日常家务。Cleaning is a daily chore. 清洁是日常家务。

quiz.question: ________ lore
quiz.explanation: 传说，民间传说。They studied folklore lore. 他们研究民间传说。

quiz.question: deplore ________
quiz.explanation: 谴责，谴责暴力。We deplore violence in all forms. 我们谴责一切形式的暴力。

quiz.question: bizarre ________
quiz.explanation: 奇异的，奇异的事件。A bizarre incident occurred. 发生了奇异的事件。

quiz.question: ____ sinecure
quiz.explanation: 闲职，轻松的闲职。He had an easy sinecure. 他有轻松的闲职。

quiz.question: secure _______
quiz.explanation: 获得，获得资金。They need to secure funding. 他们需要获得资金。

quiz.question: _______ epicure
quiz.explanation: 美食家，精致的美食家。He was a refined epicure. 他是精致的美食家。

quiz.question: obscure _________
quiz.explanation: 晦涩的，晦涩的引用。The text had an obscure reference. 文本有晦涩的引用。

quiz.question: endure ________
quiz.explanation: 忍受，忍受困难。They must endure hardship. 他们必须忍受困难。

quiz.question: prefigure ______
quiz.explanation: 预示，预示事件。These signs prefigure events to come. 这些迹象预示即将发生的事件。

quiz.question: ______ brochure
quiz.explanation: 小册子，旅游小册子。Pick up a travel brochure. 拿一份旅游小册子。

quiz.question: abjure ________
quiz.explanation: 发誓放弃，发誓放弃暴力。He would abjure violence. 他会发誓放弃暴力。

quiz.question: perjure _______
quiz.explanation: 作伪证，作伪证。Don't perjure oneself in court. 不要在法庭上作伪证。

quiz.question: ____ lure
quiz.explanation: 诱饵，鱼诱饵。Use a bright fish lure. 使用明亮的鱼诱饵。

quiz.question: demure _____
quiz.explanation: 端庄的，端庄的微笑。She gave a demure smile. 她露出端庄的微笑。

quiz.question: immure ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 监禁，终身监禁。They would immure for life. 他们会终身监禁。

quiz.question: _______ manure
quiz.explanation: 肥料，有机肥料。Use organic manure for gardens. 花园使用有机肥料。

quiz.question: tenure _____
quiz.explanation: 终身职位，终身职位轨道。Professors aim for tenure track. 教授们以终身职位轨道为目标。

quiz.question: ____ erasure
quiz.explanation: 擦除，数据擦除。Complete data erasure is important. 完全数据擦除很重要。

quiz.question: ensure ______
quiz.explanation: 确保，确保安全。We must ensure safety. 我们必须确保安全。

quiz.question: _______ closure
quiz.explanation: 关闭，公司关闭。The company closure was sudden. 公司关闭很突然。

quiz.question: ______ enclosure
quiz.explanation: 围场，花园围场。They built a garden enclosure. 他们建造了花园围场。

quiz.question: ______ cynosure
quiz.explanation: 引人注目的人，社交引人注目的人。She was the social cynosure. 她是社交引人注目的人。

quiz.question: _______ composure
quiz.explanation: 镇定，恢复镇定。She tried to recover composure. 她试图恢复镇定。

quiz.question: ___ exposure
quiz.explanation: 暴露，阳光暴露。Limit sun exposure to avoid burns. 限制阳光暴露以避免晒伤。

quiz.question: overexposure ____
quiz.explanation: 过度曝光，过度曝光风险。There's an overexposure risk. 有过度曝光风险。

quiz.question: assure _______
quiz.explanation: 保证，保证成功。Hard work will assure success. 努力工作会保证成功。

quiz.question: _________ caricature
quiz.explanation: 漫画，政治漫画。The newspaper ran a political caricature. 报纸刊登了政治漫画。

quiz.question: ligature ____
quiz.explanation: 结扎线，结扎线痕迹。The ligature mark was visible. 结扎线痕迹可见。
